entry.key: Max Length To Put In Attribute

value.name: Max Length To Put In Attribute

entry.key: Max Length To Put In Attribute

entry.value: LOAD DATA INPATH '/user/bigdataproject/gefs/gefs_${now():format('yyyyMMdd')}.csv' INTO TABLE gefs;

select date_format(valid_time, 'yyyyMMdd') as valid_time, avg(u10) as u10_avg_total, avg(v10) as v10_avg_total, avg(case when latitude >= 45 and latitude < 50 then u10 else null end) as u10_avg_south, avg(case when latitude >= 45 and latitude < 50 then v10 else null end) as v10_avg_south, avg(case when latitude >= 50 and latitude <= 55 then u10 else null end) as u10_avg_north, avg(case when latitude >= 50 and latitude <= 55 then v10 else null end) as v10_avg_north from gefs where time = "${now():format('yyyy-MM-dd')}" group by valid_time
